alert.note: Alert for Clermont; Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 23 at 6:10PM EST until January 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow mixed with some sleet at times is possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible before precipitation changes to rain by Wednesday afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of Southeast Indiana, Northern Kentucky and Southwest Ohio. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and perhaps some sleet will overspread the area Tuesday night. The snow will begin to mix with rain Wednesday morning, changing to all rain by Wednesday afternoon. A period of heavy wet snow is forecast for the morning commute, so plan accordingly.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
